Posts.EditableText:
I'm going to re-edit this later when I've played a tad bit more but I'd like to say PLEASE don't confuse this game with mine!

In the 1st room of the game, you come to the "fornt doors".  Objects can only be accessed by using their full names.

More to come....

EDIT:  on second thought, it's best that I don't.  I will say I can sort of see what the author was trying to do with SOME of the puzzles and they were somewhat good ideas but certain things seem to happen for no reason.  It's a little hard to follow.

Posts.EditableText:
I think I need a hint on this one. I'm almost at the end of the game, and I have the g.p. unlocked, the s.c. from the O.M., and the r.p. which are supposed to protect me. However, I still get shocked if I try to use the s.c. on the c.b.w.c.s. Attempts to use the r.p. don't work.

The only other parts of the game that I haven't solved are: 1) the c. in the Child's room (I couldn't open it, even with the s.k.) and 2)  the L. still says "I need to make him see how much he has hurt me. Have you got anything that will help me?" but nothing I try to give to the L. works. Hint, please?

[I've used initials to prevent spoilers.]

You should be able to finish it with just the r.p. the s.c. and the c.b.w.c.s..  you don't need to visit the L. again seeing as that's where you got the f.d.k. and the c. is not used.

CJ
